sections.content:
When we develop habits, we also develop expectations - how we want things and people to be. 

Habits and expectations take the pain and fear out of having to listen, observe, speak to people and support them to succeed. 

**But at what cost?**

While people and situations change, our habits and expectations can soon become outdated. \
\
In other words, by clinging to your, communications habits tightly, you may find yourself more and more distant from others.

sections.longDescription:
* What does relating in such a ‘closed off’ way cost you and your colleagues? 
* How much does it limit your ability to see ways to create a skilled team who find meaning in their work?
sections.question: Take a moment to consider
